text: Albert Paulsen (Albert Paulson; December 13, 1925 - April 25, 2004) was an Ecuadorian-American actor. His career began during the 1960s. He appeared in many television comedy shows. He worked with Bob Hope, Johnny Carson, and George Burns. He won a Emmy Award in 1964. Paulsen died from natural causes, aged 78.Character actor Albert Paulsen dead at 78 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1925 births Category:2004 deaths Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Entertainers from Guayaquil Category:Ecuadorian actors
title: Albert Paulsen
